DOC.brief_summary: The propose project help assess effectiveness demand-side financing project provide family planning service bundle package postnatal care infant immunization service . This approach use postnatal infant health gateway family plan - building confidence among client influencers provider reposition family plan part continuum care ensure health mother infant . Vouchers help create demand among poor woman Family plan child immunization . Also incentivizing provider voucher help improve counsel skill spend time voucher client result satisfied client well compliance Family planning method .
DOC.brief_title: Integrating Family Planning With Immunization Improve Maternal Child Health
DOC.detailed_description: Study hypothesis : Contraceptive Prevalence Rate increase 20 % baseline end line survey intervention area .Contraceptive Prevalence Rate increase 5 % baseline end line survey control area . Ethics approval : The study approve Population Services International Research Ethics Board . Study design : This quasi experimental design . The study single center . Primary study design : Interventional Trial setting : Community . Interventions : Introduction voucher improve uptake family method well child immunization . Incentivizing provider improve counsel skill improve provider client relationship well compliance Family planning method . Intervention Type : Behavioral Primary outcome measure : Number woman take modern , reversible contraceptive method , number woman avail postnatal care number woman whose infant immunize among two poor quintiles . Secondary outcome measure : Improve quality family planning service provision private sector health facility serve low-income woman . Eligibility Participant inclusion criterion - Participant type : Other . Participant inclusion criterion - Description : Women marry reproductive age group i-e 15 49 year give birth child within past one month . Participant inclusion criterion - Target number participant : 28000 . Participant exclusion criterion : Women marry reproductive age group i-e 15-49 year give birth within past 1 month .
DOC.criteria: Women marry reproductive age group ie 15 19 year give birth child within past one month Women marry reproductive age group ie 1549 year give birth within past 1 month
